name: WP Change logo
author: Accentcode

sections.description: This plugin helps you to customize wordpress defualt login page. You can change logo and body background color, text color etc.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-change-logo.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How can I change logo on login page?

Just go to admin dashboard->logo setting page and past the uploaded image url in textbox and save settings.

Can I change page background color?

Just go to admin dashboard->logo setting page and select the color from color picker and save settings.

short_description: Customized wp login page as per your requirement.
description: This plugin helps you to customize wordpress defualt login page. You can change logo and body background color, text color etc.
